name: Facial Radiance Pads with Glycolic + Lactic Acids u2013 Exfoliating Pads with AHA
about: What it is:  A daily treatment pad with lactic and glycolic acids to safely and effectively exfoliate, tone, and brighten...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination..Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores..Formulation: Wipes..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Glycolic and Lactic Acids: Alpha hydroxy acids that exfoliate skin, helping it appear brighter and with improved texture..- Lemon Peel: A natural extract that helps brighten skin's appearance..- Indian Gooseberry: A natural extract that helps tone skin...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know: Exfoliate away dull skin to help reveal a radiant and naturally glowing complexion. With regular use, this gentle exfoliator for sensitive skin also helps refine look of pores and texture for smoother skin thats ready for flawless makeup application. Now compostable for daily use!..Research results: In a consumer perception study with 55 participants after 4 weeks:.90% agreed this product gently exfoliates and makes their skin look smoother.98% agreed these pads removed residual dirt and impurities after cleansing.90% agreed this product did not irritate or feel harsh on their skin.
ingredients: -Glycolic and Lactic Acids (AHAs): Exfoliate skin for a brighter look and visibly improved texture..-Lemon Peel.-Cucumber Water..Aqua/Water/Eau, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Water, Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Chrysanthemum Parthenium (Feverfew) Extract, Polysorbate 20, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Extract, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Fruit Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Chlorphenesin, EDTA, Tetrasodium EDTA.
how_to_use: Start with clean, dry skin Wipe pad across face, neck and decollete once or twice daily. Follow with moisturizer and SPF. Dispose in trash or compost after use. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children. Anyone can use this product. A patch test is recommended for those with sensitive skin. Sunburn Alert: This product contains Glycolic and Lactic Acids that may increase your skins sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards....To Refill 60 Day Facial Radiance Jar :.1. Save your empty 60 Day Facial Radiance Pads jar after you have used all of the pads..2. Tear the seal of the 60 Day Facial Radiance Pads Refill and insert all of the new compostable Facial Radiance Pads into your empty 60-day jar. 3. Dispose of the refill pouch and keep glowing!.3. Dispose of the refill pouch and keep glowing! .*Versus Facial Radiance Pads 60 Day Packaging

reviews.review_text: Ive been using the First Aid Beauty Facial Radiance Pads, and theyve quickly become a staple in my skincare routine! These pre-soaked pads are packed with glycolic and lactic acids, and while theyre super effective at exfoliating, theyre also gentle enough for daily useu2014even on my sensitive skin.  After just a few days, I noticed my skin felt smoother, and over time, the dullness I used to see in the mirror started to fade. Theyre amazing for evening out texture, and my makeup goes on so much better now!  What I love most is how quick and easy they are to use. On busy nights, I just swipe one over my face after cleansing, and it feels like a mini spa treatment. No harshness, no rednessu2014just that fresh, radiant glow.  If youre looking for a simple way to exfoliate and brighten your skin, I cant recommend these enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using these facial radiance pads for a few days, and I can already say Im absolutely in love with them!   After experiencing one of the worst breakouts Ive had in years, I was desperate for a solution, and these pads have helped me so much. I was struggling with painful cystic pimples that felt like they were embedded in my skin, but these pads have helped clear them up significantly and have worked wonders in expelling the impurities and unclogging my pores. Im genuinely amazed at the results. My skin looks more clarified, even, and radiant.   I also like the thoughtful design of the padsu2014each one features a textured side which I use for deeper exfoliation and a smooth side for gentle application, allowing me to customize my skin care experience based on my needs.  These pads are also incredibly versatile: they can serve as a perfect one-step prep for makeup application, giving me a flawless base by simply swiping my skin with one before getting ready. I also love using them daily for gentle exfoliation and after cleansing to effortlessly remove any leftover makeup.  I am truly grateful for these radiance pads; they have made such a positive change in my skins appearance. If youre struggling with breakouts or just looking for a way to improve the look of your skin, I highly recommend giving these a try!

reviews.review_text: I have never had acne in my life. Not as a teen or now in my twenties. A couple times a year I get a hormonal pimple on my chin that last a day or two. These pads gave me acne looking tiny  bumps all over my forehead, checks and upper bridge of my nose!   This was the only new product Ive added to my routine before they appeared. Once I took them out and the bumps started to disappear. I thought this would be an easy, hygienic way to apply toner! I thought it would keep my skin smooth and give it a wonderful shine! Boy was I wrong! I stocked up thinking the comments about other people getting bumps was a one off or due to something else! Boy was I wrong. Now I have three containers of these that Im scared to even gift.   Beware: even if you dont have acne prone skin, even if you dont usually have reactions to skincare, even if you have used 10 different toners beforeu2026.these pads can cause textured bumpy skin.   Im literally so mad its not even funny. Never buying First Aid Beauty again!

reviews.review_title: Use at night, wear SPF during the day!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this product, but I think the instructions should be changed to encourage people to use these at nighttime and/or follow with SPF. This is an exfoliant and should be used at nighttime; once or twice daily, to me, sounds like something you can include in your morning routine. That's how I was using them back in 2018 and I used them every day - I wasn't using SPF every day though and I actually developed a skin cancer lesion (basal cell carcinoma). I'm NOT blaming this product for my skin cancer, but I also don't think it's a coincidence that it showed up at around the time I was going really hard on these during my daytime routine and not using SPF. You live and you learn - it's not a critique of the product but I hope folks reading the reviews will see this and decide to use this product in their evening routines + follow with a good sunscreen in the morning! This goes for any AHA-containing or exfoliating product because they make your skin more UV sensitive!

reviews.review_title: Made my skin break out in all sorts of acne!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I read through the ingredients and did not find anything in this product that should have broken me out but sadly it did. I got a sample packet of this in my order. I had to put the rest of the pads in a ziplock baggie so the pads wouldnt dry out. I have sensitive, adult acne prone skin but ever since I started using the right products, I rarely experience acne anymore. I only get a zit every other menstrual period I have. I use Andalous kombucha cleanser, Paulas Choice clear moisturizer (look for promo codes to get free shipping and a discount on their website). My staple face masks are the MUACs pumpkin face mask with glycolic acid and The Ordinarys peel mask. My skin has already been purged long ago. I used one of these wipes all over my face and neck and the next day I woke up with a few red zits, white heads and black heads all around my t-zone. It has been 1 week since I used the pad and my skin is still trying to recover. I get this exact reaction from other pore clogging products. If you have acne prone skin STEER CLEAR!!! I dont know that caused the acne in this product but something did. Instead, I recommend The Ordinary peel mask and MUACs pumpkin facial mask for acid exfoliation. The pumpkin mask smells like pumpkin pie and you only leave it on for 5 minutes!! Its gentle but still lacks a punch for exfoliation and clearing pores. I use the pumpkin mask once a week every 3 days. The Ordinary peel is stronger, I use it once a week and I leave it on for less than 9 minutes. If I did not use the pumpkin mask, I would use The Ordinary peel twice a week. I do think the pumpkin mask packs more of a punch than the T.O. Peel though, in my experience. If you have sensitive skin you do not have to leave The Ordinary peel mask on for an entire 9-10 minutes. Everybodys skin is different. The drier your skin is, the less time you should leave the T.O. Peel mask on. Even if you can only stand to leave it on for 3-5 minutes, thats still enough exfoliation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so happy when #firstaidbeautygiftedme their Facial Radiance Pads because I used them off & on in years past with great success, no matter my skin type at the time of use. My skin has been dry, extremely sensitive, oily, & now normal-to-dry, & the @firstaidbeauty pads completely transformed my skin. Since it had been a few years since I last used the toner/ exfoliation pads, I decided I would test these for 3 + weeks before reviewing.  First off, lets cover what makes the Facial Radiance Pads so magical. They contain both Lactic + Glycolic Acids to gently (but deeply) exfoliate, brighten, & tone the skin. Formulation includes both Indian Gooseberry + Cucumber to tone, while Lemon Peel + Licorice Root brighten skins appearance & invoke a beautiful glow. All skin types can use these, even sensitive skin! This #firstaidbeauty product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, clean, & non-comedogenic.  After 3.5 weeks Ive noticed: * Smaller pore size/ less noticeable pores * Textured areas are smoother * Small scars + old acne marks are starting to fade * Skin tone is more even & bright * Radiant, healthy glow. Dullness where??!! * Makeup applies much easier & more evenly * Redness has been reduced * Clears up current acne + ingrown hairs so they resolve faster  OBSESSED. Im obsessed with these Facial Radiance Pads all over again! I will purchase these when I run out because I love the benefits I get from them & like that I can use it as a toner + exfoliator in one. Plus, I am dying to get the Limited Edition tub of pads! At nighttime I use 1/2 or a whole pad on my face, neck, & decollete after cleansing (the FAB Pure Skin Face Cleanser is perfect for this step!), then let it dry down for 5-10 minutes. Afterwards, I pat in a thicker toner or essence with my hands, & follow it up with my serum(s), eye cream, + moisturizer. If the results Ive seen in the last ~4 weeks are any indication, then Im up for DRAMATIC results in 6 months. I cant wait to see!

reviews.review_text: I consider myself to have pretty normal skin, neither acne-prone nor sensitive. I used about half of these radiance pads before I realized how much they dried out my skin. I used these once a day after cleanser and before serum and moisturizer. Instead of improving skins texture like it claims, my pores were more noticeable than before and my serum would not apply evenly as a result. Im not a skincare specialist but I would think the AHAs in these pads produce a drying effect and over time, they have an opposite effect to what was intended. Thus, if you decide to purchase these I would recommend short-term use or waiting between uses to save your skin from becoming too dry and in turn, producing more oil.

reviews.review_text: I am amazed. I started with super dry, scaly, and irritated skin by my cheekbones but in the 2-3 weeks since I've started using these, my skin's texture has changed drastically for the better!   My cheekbones are no longer scaly to the touch and my skin has such a gorgeous glow to it! I have noticed that my redness that came alongside my irritation is starting to fade as well!  I use them every other night and it has done wonders for me! If their other products are equally as good as their radiance pads, I'm looking forward to trying more from them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give this more than 5 stars, I would. I'm a sucker for marketing, so there's been a few times that other toners have caught my eye and I've stopped using these pads. Huge regrets. Every time I stop using these pads, my skin freaks out. I don't think I have many holy grail products, but this is DEFINITELY one of them. Someone else mentioned you can cut each pad into 2, which is exactly what I do. There's plenty of product in half of each pad and I use them morning and night religiously. If these were ever discontinued, I would be devastated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't write reviews often... but.. I had to to for this one. I am turning 31 in a few weeks, and since turning 30 my skin has been extra testy, giving me a lot of trouble (extra sensitive, red, flakey, with some small breakouts). I got these in the All That FAB Kit and have been using them for about 5-6 days.  Since I started using this plus the ultra repair cream, my skin looks and feels AMAZING. I am fair-skinned and have freckles/maybe some beginner age spots and since using these my age spots have diminished and my skin looks incredibly youthful and bright. I just can't believe how quickly I saw and felt a difference from this product. As someone with sensitive/dry skin, I can say that most FAB products have been life-savers for me, but this one just might be my favourite. I look and feel 3-4 years younger (TRUST ME) The best. Period.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I heard about this product through and influencer and I am so impressed. My skin used to be very rough, and by using these once every night or every other my skin has become much more smooth. Makes it a lot easier to apply makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, acne prone, sensitive skin that has a lot of texture. These pads worked great at evening my complexion without irritation. They are a great product, but you have to use them consistently. I noticed after I finished off my first bottle that my texture quickly came back.

reviews.review_title: Great So Far - But Odd Smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like them so far! I can tell they clean and brighten my sensitive / combo skin really nicely. The effects on my complexion are already noticeable and it's only been a week or so since I've been using them.   My only complaint - they have a strange smell that is really strong while using them, but then afterwards it's not as bad. Just an odd feature I noticed.   Otherwise, they're great and really have a nice effect on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't notice that much of a difference in overall complexion after multiple weeks of using it. plus it's not very cost efficient since every pad is almost 50u00a2. I like The Ordinary Lactic Acid 10% much better for the same purpose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using these pads for about two weeks now (every couple of nights) and they have seriously freshened up my skin SO much! I'm noticing my dark circles fading faster than normalu2013probably because this clears away room for my retinoid to settle inu2013and I have ZERO bumps on my skin right now. I have extremely sensitive skin and am very prone to acne, especially because of wearing a mask (which is obnoxious but we gotta do itu2013pls Americans, pls wear a mask), but these have really helped. Will buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Exfoliates, tones & brightens skin with one facial cotton pad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate that I'm writing a review about these because I dont want them to sell out but these are a game changer. They make ur skin so glowy and clean and they really help sooth and tone. I have sensitive skin and they are amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: these are fantastic! i use these at night and my skin looks glowy and refreshed the next morning. helps with my acne too! i have sensitive textured combo/acne-prone skin and this helps a lot. i alternate with farmacy's honeymoon glow. the only products that seem to help with any acne and texture (if i don't use a spot treatment)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use retinol every night and it doesnt seem to do the trick. I started using these as well and my skin is much more even and bright and soft. Wow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I will repurchase again and again. These radiance pads make such a difference on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! I use this as a toner and just before putting on my moisturizer. I have very sensitive skin and these dont make me irritated. I can tell the difference in my skins apparence when I dont use it. I also use this on a burn scar (red and blue-ish) I have on my arm and while it didnt erase the scar, after a while Ive noticed that my scar is a little lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I dont like this product. Dont worth the money! Nothing changed on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought these while the salicylic acid pads were out of stock. I like to use pads like these morning and night to make sure I'm getting a clean, fresh start before applying other skin care. I think these are great, I just much prefer the salicylic acid pads for my acne-prone skin. But they're totally effective for their purpose, and I would use them happily if I didn't have acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using these for about a month now and I can definitely noticed a difference in my skin. In the past, I have really struggled with toners/chemical exfoliants because my skin breaks out easily with strong products but this is very gentle and has never caused me issues. My skin is smoother, less red, and brighter when I use these every night before my moisturizer so I will definitely keep this as a staple in my night routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I initially got these in a boxycharm but I had to buy some for myself once I ran out. These pads are so amazing. The quality in my skin has changed so much. My skin is so much softer, glowy and even. They also help clear up my hormonal breakouts faster!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product! All their stuff is great :) Ive also been using them on my boyfriend who has fairly bad acne and it seems to help calm them down and keep them under control! Highly recommended!

reviews.review_title: Your skin will thank you! Get these!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These exfoliating pads are very effective yet gentle enough for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these! I was using the Malin & Goetz Resurfacing wipes but decided to give these a try. They are definitely more gentle but still feel really effective. I use almost every night and they do not irritate my skin at all. Will definitely keep purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Product has brightened my skin and helped get rid of acne on my jawline. I had a deep pimple on my neck for about a month and after using the pads for one week, the pimple is finally going away. Product also helps with my dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Please do not buy this product. It has completely changed my skin for the worse. The photo where my skin looks clear is just a month before I started using these pads. The breakout photo is two months after I discontinued use- Im still experiencing breakouts like Ive never had before. My skin wasnt terrible prior to use, I just had some dullness and the occasional pimple/breakout. I used one full tub of the pads, went through them in 6 weeks. I continued use even after breaking out immediately afterwards because I thought my skin was u2018purging. Saw my dermatologist after I decided to discontinue use and it was suggested I go on acctuane because of the cystic acne I developed on my cheeks. Accutane had never even been an option for me before because my breakouts were not that bad. Im African American with combination skin. Please please please dont buy. I used pixie glow pads in the past with no issues but wanted to try something new and I wholeheartedly regret it. Havent felt like myself in months and I have no idea how to get my skin back to normal.

reviews.review_title: theyre okay, not worth the money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like these but they dont do much. They do brighten your skin but not very much. Youre better off just using a vitamin c serum or something

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this. I have fairly sensitive skin so I used it initially 2x a week in the morning then to every day in the morning, avoiding my cheeks. It says to use 1-2 times a day. Maybe that was my issue? Either way, I didn't see any difference in my skin, neck, or decollete. For $44 and 60 pads, I think I'll try a retinoid. There's a hype to this so maybe my skin just doesn't respond.. I don't know.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried it out two times, and it caused an allergic reaction. My skin is slightly sensitive, but I haven't really had too many problems with other products, so I'm not sure what triggered it. Won't be able to use it anymore and would recommend using it with caution if your skin is sensitive and/or you've had some kind of contact allergy before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Im giving it 3 stars, at first it made my face radiant but after a couple of days of using it I broke out. My entire forehead was covered in small pimples as well as my cheeks. This has been the only new product that Ive used all over my face. Disappointed that it didnt work out, wouldnt recommend if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: MAKES SKIN FEEL SO BRIGHT AND CLEAN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the product makes a noticeable change in my face. I can tell there is a brightness in my face and it takes off the debris that remained on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin tends to get dull and these are amazing for daily brightening. They also are great at getting some of the makeup off that you may have missed when washing your face. A go to product for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are great! They leave my skin feeling fresh and ready for the rest of my routine, they do not burn or make me red and I have VERY sensitive skin. I have read ppl cut them in half and there is definitely wet enough to do this I just find it makes the pad to small and hard to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works but expensive because I go through a big container a month... 34$ a month and 50cents per pad for 1 products is to much. Id rather buy the YSL version that works better and lasts longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Helps with dark spots and texture on my face. Wasnt too harsh on my skin. Great at night but I use mornings and nights. Make up application is great flawless right after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these. On my third container of them and will probably buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are gentle... too gentle? I honestly don't know if they did anything for my skin. The pads themselves are textured and the solution feels nice on the skin but I can't say that my skin truly looked or felt better after consistent use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive had stubborn dry patches around my nose piercing and that area in general for so many years Ive lost count. Was previously using st ives apricot scrub which apparently is a huge no no. Ive been using this for a week and I have to admit the flaky skin is going away...slowly but its improving! Im only using them at night and I use the whole pad because I also do my neck. Im excited to see if this will solve my flaky skin problems for good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Changed my skin. I was never huge into toner or chemical exfoliators before this but these have absolutely changed my skincare game. They dont sting (& im pretty sure theyre alcohol free). They dont seem to have any irritating fragrances, either. They really help with the texture of my skin. Would highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Lactic and glycolic acid, great for exfoliating
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a good alternative to a physical exfoliator or scrub. This does the trick and is way less sensitizing. It has aloe and cucumber extract but also lactic and glycolic acid which will provide that exfoliating factor, as well as the pad itself. It lasted me pretty long and I feel my skin benefitted from using them. It does leave a tacky feel afterwards. Overall, good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoy this product as someone with extremely sensitive skin and rosacea type 2. I was getting a lot of texture and maskne, these pads did the trick. The bumps are clearing up and my skin isn't red and angry. Just a reminder that it takes 4-6 weeks to see a big improvement!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using these for 3 weeks now. I use them maybe 2 times a week as I dont feel the need to use daily. I will say that I have noticed a difference in my skin since I have started using these pads. My skin seems smoother and has a glow from within! As many people have said, I cut the pad in half as there is plenty of product. Would recommend if you are looking for a super easy application that also provides noticeable results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like that these gently exfoliate and keeps my skin clear and glowing. I wash first with Dr. Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Cleanser, then FAB radiance pads, then Dr. Dennis Gross exfoliating moisturizer. I have not had an issue with breakouts since.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using these pads for the past 2 years. I cut them in half because there is enough liquid in 1 pad for 2 uses. I noticed that when I would travel for work and not bring them there was a difference in the way my make up applied and my face would become drier. I used to get dry patches in the winter and these helped exfoliate gently enough to remove those. My skin has definitely changed for the better!

reviews.review_title: great addition to alternate into a routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product!! I use it every other night or so (alternate with something more hydrating) and my skin is bright, clear, and pores seem smaller. Also, I figured out if you peel or cut one pad into two, you double the quantity as there is more than enough product on each pad! Would definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use these every night great for ur skin  I got this set and I love all FAB products there great for my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love First Aid Beauty but this product didnt do a thing. No difference from before I used it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am OBSESSED. When I noticed these pads were lightening my sun spots, my jaw dropped. I didnt know something would actually lighten them. Ive been using these pads for awhile and now I am focusing on scrubbing the spots I want lightened and its working miracles. Just ordered these for 3 family members. They are AMAZING!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I dont get the hype about this, made my pores larger, didnt help with anything tbh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love these!! I first tried the sample and was convinced right away. They are a great addition to my morning routine and also a good way to refresh my face for my evening looks. The smell is lovely too! J'adore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with these! I have VERY sensitive skin and recently developed rosacea. These are super gentle and leave my skin feeling radiant and smooth. Worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this while it was on sale for the Holiday 50% special. I have mature skin and find these to be great for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not drying, smells good. I cut it in half to last longer since its a little expensive but half of a pad is more than enough. Helps keep me glowy and helps with pores/acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My forehead tends to get very congested, despite keeping it clean and regular exfoliating. It just always felt bumpy and rough, occasionally with teeny tiny pimples. I added these pads to my morning and nighttime routine and within just two weeks the congestion is somewhere around 90% gone.  Hot tip - cut these babies in halves (if you want to include your neck) or thirds.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this after seeing Dr. Shereene Idriss, a New York City dermatologist using this in her evening night routine.    I use this a few times a week...though haven't seen significant results....will keep using on nights when I am not using exfoliation or mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used these up over a period of about a year. I was not in love with this product since it left a sheen over my skin that felt a little sticky (it didn't last for long, though), but I did keep coming back to it because it does as it promises, which is to exfoliate, tone, & brighten. I am still looking for a better match for me, but I did like these pads.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a jar of these in one of my subscription boxes. In the past, I've used Dr. Dennis Gross HG peel pads, which are amazing, but can be costly. I can honestly say that I found these FAB pads to be equally amazing!! My results were extremely close to my DDG results.  If you're not in a position to pay $90 for a box of DDG pads, try these - you  won't be missing out on any you get what you pay for benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased this in April, along with the moisturizer, and cleanser, and it made me breakout. I  was really disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect exfoliant for my dry, sensitive, acne prone skin. Other chemical exfoliants cause me to break out worse, these are the only ones just just leave me with a glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When the FAB line was first available in the Sephora location closest to my home, I began using these religiously as I found that they exfoliated and toned my skin really well.  I took a break from using them but started again recently.  I'm not sure if the formula has changed but I don't find these nearly as effective as I once did.  I haven't noticed much of a change to my skin and these have left a sticky feeling after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never had a huge problem with acne but I have large pores that become visibly clogged and that causes me to pick at them which makes it 10 times worse. I have been using this product everyday for about a week and I am amazed at the results!! I didnt think it was possible to actually shrink your pores but I was wrong. My pores are noticeably much smaller in appearance and therefore do not get nearly as clogged as before so I have been able to reduce my picking almost entirely. My skin looks so much clearer and brighter its almost like a miracle. I was initially a bit weary of purchasing this product because it is a bit pricy for everyday use however the pads are moist enough that you can actually use them more than once before discarding (I have been using each one twice). After the first use just squish the pad back down on to the stack of pads and it will re-moisten. This helps make them more affordable however they are well worth the price anyway in my opinion. I am beyond happy with this product and will most definitely repurchase again and again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The pads are nice, but nothing more. Not suitable for oily skin and acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The pads are nice, but nothing more. Not suitable for oily skin and acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First Aid Beauty is not typically a brand that I reach for, but I am SOOOOO happy that I gave this product a try!! I am IN LOVE with these pads!! I use them in the mornings after I cleanse my face as a super gentle exfoliator. My skin absolutely glows after I use them, and has not felt this soft in years!! Gentle enough for every day use, although I would stick to once a day rather than morning and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found this was an effective step in my evening cleansing routine. Even after using micellar water these pads got even more dirt and make up off. I loved this product but only gave it 3 stars due to the price point which is fairly high considering they are just exfoliating pads.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive skin and this is one of the few exfoliating products that I can use without pain and redness. Gentle and effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty good toning pads - I used the 28 pack for about a month (I cut them in half because they were just as effective that way).  I used them mostly before working out in the morning so that I didn't have to fully wash my face until I showered afterwards.  I don't think they're necessary but it's still a good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these facial radiance pads! It exfoliates my sensitive skin without irritating it at all. It is a new must in my daily routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are definitely a game changer for me. I had really bad acne everywhere on my face then acne scars. This has brightened my face and I have a clear complexion now. I use it twice a day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample so I was not expecting much from this brand. Maybe its because its a leave on peel where as most peel pads require you to wash the peel off after a few minutes, but I find these leave my skin looking so youthful and bright. The best part about it is they dont dry out your skin and not having to wash them off is one less step in your routine which makes things more convenient. I recommend especially as they are at an excellent price point!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was recommended to me by one of the workers at Sephora. I used them that night and I was shocked at the result. I had recently used these other exfoliating pads that left my skin burning. So I was a little nervous when trying these, but they came through and are a staple in my skin care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: No radiance or good change in my skin texture. Just liked the exfoliating part. Tried for 2 months. Pretty disappointed.

reviews.review_title: one of my holy grail products
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use these pads first thing in the morning and let my skin dry before applying my moisturizers. I notice a difference right away u2014 my skin absolutely glows and my clogged pores subside considerably. Its also gentle. No stinging sensation for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only used it for a few days but I already saw some improvements, my skin tone is more bright and my acne marks are fading faster!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like these for after Ive cleansed my face. They take off any excess that Ive missed when washing. I havent noticed changes in the tone of my skin, however with the combo of my serums and creams my face does u201cbrightenu201d up. Plus the convenience of the pre-moistened pads make it even better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I stopped taking the pill, I started getting acne like I hadnt seen since middle school. Mostly small, shallow whiteheads, but some deep cystic pimples too. My skin is sensitive and prone to redness as is, so I stopped using physical exfoliants ages ago, but Ive been nervous when it comes to acids too. I tried these pads per the recommendation of a Sephora employee a while back and noticed my skin was definitely brighter and smoother, but I was too scared to use the acid more than once every few days. Since Ive been working from home the past few months, Ive been a little more willing to try new things and started using these pads every other night and my skin is the best its been in a year! Still some redness (though much less) and a few pimples here and there but such a huge improvement! My skin is clearer, smoother, brighter, more even, and healthier than its been in a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love using it. Helps a lot with my acne and keep it down. Face is lets Oily, which happens a lot in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these. I use them about 3 times a week in the evening. They help even out my skin texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like FAB products in general especially during the long winter months in Canada, but this one is a bit of a meh. I've used other exfoliating pads that have worked better for me. This one is great for the summer, but it's very drying to use in the winter, or during those transitioning months when your skin becomes super sensitive. I like using these as a first step in my skincare routine in the morning underneath makeup. I guess it would really depend on what your skin type is, but during summer months, I use one almost every day so considering that, it's not that cost efficient. I've tried neogen, and cosrx exfoliating pads, and personally, cosrx's moisture up pads worked better for my skin, and is half of the price of this for 70 sheets. Sucks sephora doesn't carry them. reviews.review_title: Cleared and is controlling my perioral dermatitis!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I turned 37 and got an itchy rash that turns into tiny white bumps, and scales/peels the next day - perioral dermatitis as per my Dermatologist. Nothing they prescribed me worked! So I decided to stop all skin care and try this because I read somewhere that lactic acid helps with flaking that is found in some autoimmune skin conditions. I use this and then follow up with Bio Oil to increase the effectiveness of the acids as well as because this leaves my skin tacky a bit and tingly and oil neutralizes that. This takes the rash down to flat within 3 days. The oil makes the skin feel like heaven and prevents the flakes from being noticeable. I tried Drunk Elephant night glycolic acid serum and it immediately flared up again so I know there must be something in this - perhaps that lactic acid, maybe aloe, not sure.  Either way, the benefits are beyond taking the embarrassing scaly red bums down, now my whole face is looking brighter and glowier. I have been using it for 2 months daily. My olive skin is prone to dark spots after a pimple heals or if I get any scratch even, and this in combination with the Bio Oil has taken all those healing discolorations from the rash right away in one month! Almost forgot to say, I use Bio Oil on my mouth area, but use another oil for the rest of the face (Coachella Naturals Hempseed Oil).

I use it two times per week during my nightly routine.  On nights I use this I follow it with a light moisturizer (Clinique gel moisturizer opposed to my regular La Mer).  The next morning I always exfoliate (with Lushs Angel on Bare Skin) to draw out the impurities it draws to the surface.  My skin is adapting to it really nicely!  My redness has subsided (I also use vitamin e serum everyday before I apply sunscreen which helps), my overall tone is more even, and my skin looks bright + tight!  No burning, no chemical smell!  I love it!  On nights/mornings I dont use this to tone, I recommend Freshs rose toner.  Its gentle and pairs great with this product.  Thanks Sephora!

reviews.review_text: A few years ago these came in a First Aid Beauty value set, I used them all and remember thinking u201cmy skin has never been better.u201d It looked bright, even, and had reduced acne/scars. I always told myself I would repurchase these pads on their own but never did. This year, my skin has been incredibly dry and flaky with the harsh Canadian winter and Ive been breaking out as well. I thought back to when my skin looked amazing while using these and decided to finally repurchase as I was desperate for something to exfoliate and help tame my skin. Well, after using these for a couple weeks, my skin is like butter. I have no breakouts, no flakes, and my complexion and dark spots are brighter. I start with a toner, then use one of the pads, followed by a really good moisturizer and eye cream, and thats pretty much it. These will now be a staple in my skin care routine from now on!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Didnt want to pay for the Dennis Gross and was looking to switch up from Neogen. So far I have used 10 or so of these pads (so consider that when reading this review). I have to say that they are nothing special. I dont notice any particular benefits. My skin doesnt look better. But my skin also doesnt look worse. I havent noticed any redness or breakouts or sensitivities, which is common for me. After these are done Ill probably go back to the Neogen pads.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I alternate between physical and chemical exfoliants so I don't use this everyday, but it took a good 6 months to go through this. The formula is great. Some chemical exfoliants make me break out in tons of tiny red bumps everywhere (e.g. Glossier toner) but these haven't bothered my skin at all. If I thoroughly rub the pad all over, it really does give me a glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are my lazy day pads. I mostly shower at night, so I use these pads in the morning to get my daily skincare routine started. So far so good. Face can be a little sticky after use.

reviews.review_title: A good replacement for Good Genes.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My advice to anyone is to have realistic expectations and to make sure glycolic acid doesnt make you break out. I really like these. They really brighten and soften my skin.   I keep seeing a trend with the negative reviews, where most people seeing insignificant results all have acne as a concern. I feel like acne scarring will be helped with products like this but to a certain degree. I happen to not suffer from acne and just have average texture so for me these work great. My skin looks brighter, feels softer and I think these are a great replacement for my Good Genes that I cant in good conscious buy anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not notice an actual difference in my skin. If you like these kinds of pads I would recommend the M-61 PowerPeel pads. They are so much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use these every night and love them. I have dry sensitive skin and haven't had any reactions. They are a bit on the expensive side and I've heard of people cutting them in half to make them go further but they're kind of a pain to cut so I can't be bothered. I don't mind paying a bit extra if something works. Sometimes you get a better deal on these if you get them in a boxed set so check the prices because some of the promo sets come with them a bit cheaper and you get some other stuff that you may not need but if it's free who cares!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing, especially for my makeup clients, who need an extra bit of exfoliating to their skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These live up to the other reviews! I rarely have had anything work like it says - but these do! I'm 41, and have better skin now than in my 30's. It's clear, and glowing. (minus the fine lines LOL) I will be buying more from this line...new obsession :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these! They are so convenient and they do a great job at toning and exfoliating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I suffered with melasma during pregnancy, which exacerbated my eczema, which turned into photosensitive eczema. I take injections for my atopic dermatitis and am very limited in which ingredients I can use. This stuff WORKS. It helped to clear up the darkness left over from melasma and eczema scarring and has helped smooth the texture of my skin. My mom asked me what I had done when I came downstairs immediately after the FIRST time I used these along with the face wash and repair cream! I know these pads work because the discoloration extended into my ears and the pads are the only thing that I use in my ears. I've been using these pads ever since (about 3 years).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are pretty nice. But do not follow the package recommendation to use it once or twice a day. Against my better judgement I tried this and got some hyperpigmentation for a few days. But overall does a great job.

reviews.review_title: Toner and exfoliator all in one pad.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These pads are great for gentle exfoliating of the skin. The smell is not too strong and doesnt stay on the skin. Leaves the skin feeling smooth and silky and absorbs fairly quickly. The pads are sturdy and dont tear easily which is good. And after you take the pad out and exfoliate once you can wait until the skin is dry and exfoliate again as the pad doesnt dry very quickly so you could get 2-3 good exfoliations of the face from one pad in one go. I am still iffy about the price point, but its a toner and exfoliator in one so Im happy about that. Good for summer and winter times and any skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle and didnt irritate my face but I honestly didnt really see a difference in my skin. I prefer to use slightly stronger weekly exfoliating products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using these radiance pads for about a month now - I see no different in the texture of my skin. This has been such a disappointment - the first time a 'First aid beauty' has been ineffective. Don't waste your money on this useless product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has gotten really sensitive as Ive gotten older, and these exfoliate but are gentle enough not to hurt my skin - I love them!

reviews.review_text: Ive never used an AHA before. After my first night applying to my face, I woke up with smoother skin and was SHOCKED. It is gentle enough not to make my sensitive, acne prone skin red and tight but potent enough to see an overnight difference!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These saved my face. Winters are very cold and dry and my face was falling apart and these got rid of the dry skin!

reviews.review_title: Great for my acne prone (and pregnant) skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair, sensitive, acne prone skin.  I'm also pregnant!  I have been using these pads for 2 months and my skin is looking great!   I've done well in the past with glycolic and lactic acid based products, so I knew this probably would not irritate my skin.  I'm not sure if it's a change in my hormones in the second trimester, the use of this product, or some combination of the two, but skin is clear of breakouts and the texture is much improved.  Will continue using even after pregnancy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this exfoliating pads! I noticed a difference almost immediately in my skin. I found then gentle enough for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its a really practical product, it really helps to have a smooth skin when you have a sensitive skin. Its perfect!

reviews.review_text: Did nothing to my face, and actually gave me more texture on my skin, I did not want to waste the money so some people recommended using it under armpits and other areas

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always get a few annoying little red spots, particularly around my nose and chin and decollete. These pads INSTANTLY take them away though. Ive been using these for about two weeks and I am in love. They really do help brighten and tone the skin. Im shocked at how fast Ive seen results. My only concern with these though is their environmental impact as they are cotton pads that are being tossed in the trash. Just something to think about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate that I love these! The drugstore versions of these dont compare, and the concentration of glycolic acid is low, and theyre filled with fragrance, which is super sensitizing.   I have VERY dry, VERY sensitive skin, and FAB just gets it right when it comes to sensitive skin. Everyone needs a little exfoliation in their life, but most acids make my skin burn, and it turns red and blotchy. These provide just the right amount of exfoliation without irritating my skin, and the pads last WAY longer if you cut them in half! I use them ~ 3 nights a week (using an acid every night can damage your skin barrier,) and both the big and small size of these pads last forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buy this product! It's amazing. I was looking for something alcohol and fragrance free to help with my acne and acne scars. I was using this expensive PTR serum which was helpful for a bit bit eventually lost its effectiveness. These pads have helped keep all my breakout in check, diminishes scarring and gives me a nice glow. It's a holy grail product. I rarely get breakouts anymore, and if I do, they are gone almost immediately.  I use this with the FAB face moisturizer with a pump and the FAB pure skin cleanser. My skin has never been better. Just a tip: do cut them in half. They are very saturated, and all you need is half.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These did not do anything for me. Plus have no scent. Ive used almost all the pads and each time feel like Im simply wiping my face with water. A definite not get again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an effective yet gentle product! Definitely keeps my skin clear and bright! I love the convenience of this- daily exfoliation and toner in one! I can be super sensitive and this doesnt irritate!  Definitely worth it! Travels well with me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So meh!! This didnt do anything for my skin (and I used the whole damn container). There are a TON of more effective products at lower price points out there. I say, dont bother!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With my current skincare regimen I never really get breakouts and have quite bright and glowing skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells like alcohol despite being alcohol-free and leaves your face super tacky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It made me break out REALLY badly. Im really disappointed because I LOVE FABs products and their ingredient list. Though, I think it was a big red flag to try and recommend daily exfoliating as a base suggestion. Especially if it seems to overlook the subjectivity and variety folks have with exfoliating. I myself know I usually use chemical exfoliators with those ingredients weekly at best; and maybe every 4 days if Im experiencing more dead skin build up than usual.  So this is going to be a no for me, but Ill continue to their other products out in the mean time. I suggest you see if you can get a sample and see how it works with your dads before you purchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

A great preventive product. It also works well to prevent skin pimples or in grown hairs after shaving.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: A M A Z I N G !!! this product is soooo goood, it helps with my dead skin and leaves such a nice finish My skin products are smoother and my makeup is way nicer Would definitely recommend! I have combo skin and this really helps why my dry skin.  Honestly buy it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive dry skin and I was looking to add something to my skin regimen that would help with the texture of my face and help brighten my face. I feel like I saw results within a week of using these pads. I feel like my face is less textured and more evened out. I luckily havent had any reactions to these pads so I will definitely continue to purchase this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using these pads daily for about 3 weeks, primarily at night after removing my makeup and cleansing, but sometimes in the morning as well. I purchased it in the Fablantis set. 3 weeks is a rather short period of time but I can already see results. By the end of the first week I noticed my breakouts had frozen, they hadn't got better necessarily but they hadn't gotten worse. By about 2.5 weeks I noticed that my skin is visibly smoother, my cystic acne has nearly disappeared for the first time in years, and my blackheads are nearly completely gone- something I have grappled with my whole life. My husband has even noticed the difference and has given me compliments. I saw some reviews that say the pad is too large, but this is something I disagree with. I find that the pad is just the right size- I wipe my face completely about 3 times to really get the area well as well as my neck and it is just the right amount. I am absolutely floored that I have found something that works so well for my troubled skin! I hope to never be without this product and I haven't even used it for a whole month yet!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product!! I use them every night before bed and I cut them in half to get more uses! Theyve really helped keep my acne more under control!

Not bad for a 55-year-old. I've stopped wearing foundation daily; let's see what happens with FAB tinted moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am only giving this product three stars at this point. I have been using it about every other day for two weeks and my skin is so dry. I only use it once per day because I noticed the drying and thought maybe I needed to ease in it a bit more slowly. I do think it brightens my skins a bit, but an exfoliant that is drying is not what I am looking for. I think I will give them to my daughter who has Oily skin and go back to using my Dr. Gross alpha beta pads. I think these pads are missing the second step Dr. Gross has which puts the good stuff back into your skin after exfoliating with step 1.

reviews.review_text: Wow. Just wow. Tried these on the recommendation of an Instagram beauty blogger and I am so in love. Evens out skin tone and clears up acne without drying skin. Downside, these are insanely pricey, about $0.50 per pad.

reviews.review_text: These are gentle and could be used every day. I like to use these about every third day, whenever I feel texture building on my face. They are very gentle and could be used daily.

reviews.review_text: I like it. Was spending a lot of money on Dr. Gross peels and wanted to see if something cheaper was the same......... its not. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has changed my face. I would pretty much always have at least a few pimples on my face at any given time which builds up to a lot of scaring and pigmentations Im not fond of. Starting the radiance wipes cleared the acne in about 3 days evening my skin texture. I started noticing a more even skin tone with acne scarring and pigment after about a week. Im so happy with this product! If youre someone that happens to shave your face, dont apply after shaving unless you can tolerate some severe stinging action.

reviews.review_title: great for sensitive skin its not an intense pee
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: these are not your strong dr dennis gross peel pads. these are super gentle for those with sensitive skin and minimal skin texture. if u are sensitive or your skin is pretty good and u have just slight texture these are perfect for you they arent super super exfoliating or super strong but if u have good skin and want just a slight exfoliation these will be perfect for you. my skins not sensitive but i dont like using strong peels bc my skin is pretty good i just have some occasional texture and this product helps me a lot it also helps with the black and white heads i get on my nose. overall this is great for someone younger who doesnt need a lot of exfoliation. if you are more mature or have a lot of texture and scarring i would suggest something stronger.

reviews.review_text: Is sensitive enough to be used as part of my daily routine. Great for gentle exfoliation, doesnt aggravate my acne-prone skin.

It did tingle a bit when I applied but not something un bearable. Really good product !

reviews.review_text: I've been through Soooo many of these and I keep coming back. Like a *slightly* less aggressive version than DDG pads, these are easier on the skin mantle and I feel I can use everyday without killing my skin and still getting great benefits.

reviews.review_text: I had four pimples on my jawline from hormonal acne (that time of the month.) Literally after the first use of this product they went away! The only thing it didn't do is make my skin feel hydrated but that's okay because I put a moisturizer on afterwards anyway. Highly recomend this for anyone with acne. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best exfoliater I've ever used. I've had acne my entire life, adult hormonal acne my entire adult life, and on top of that have issues with cell turnover. Medication keeps most of my acne in check, but these help to significantly reduce my scarring, redness, dry patches, and residual breakouts when my skin is just stressed.   Like other have said, you can also cut them in half as the pads are so saturated you really only need half the amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had previously used a different brand of facial pads that was slightly more expensive and decided to try these since the FAB Ultra Repair Cream is HG for me. What can I tell you - I don't even use them every day and what a difference in my skin! My pores are smaller, my skin is definitely clearer and more radiant and feels great. And yes, as soon as I find a good pair of scissors I will cut them in half to get even more bang for my buck. Awesome job FAB, you did it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product. I have very sensitive skin, so naturally I was hesitant, so at first I bought the small pack of 30 pads. After a month of using it once a day I have noticed that my skin looks better, more vivid and bright. I am currently finishing my second pack and I am definitely planning to buy more. It leaves very nice moisture on skin, so in very hot summer days there is no need to use the moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: what i like is how easy to use these are. i wanted a quick fix to small breakouts i was having (little bumps, not large zits) and they werent going away. i found these and because of all the great reviews gave it a try. its a super easy product to add into my routine and honestly got rid of the breakout. while breaking out i used in both AM and PM. now i use basically once a day if i feel the need for some more glow. overall would definitely recommend these.

reviews.review_title: Great morning cleanser alt for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the few products in my skincare routine that, once discovered, Ive never strayed from. A helpful sales associate recommended it to me a few years ago when I expressed concerns about my sensitive skin - I asked for something that would help with texture and dullness and mentioned that my skin dries out easily with most cleansers. She recommended that I use these (gently wiping, not scrubbing) in place of a morning cleanser, before toning etc, and only use a liquid cleanser in the evenings. I admit, I was skeptical, but it was a brilliant suggestion! This product has helped my skin tremendously (dulless/pores/overall texture and glow), makes my face feel fresh in the morning, and doesnt dry it out. It is, however, too strong to use twice a day on my skin, so if you also have sensitive skin, Id stick to the same once a day use (and then the product last two months, which is great). Tip: after using the pad on your face, wipe it along the backs of your hands as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is wonderful!! So convenient and easy to use! Theyre very gentle and dont irritate me whatsoever, but at the same time very fast acting and effective!! I had little bumps all over my skin and theyre almost all gone (I also have Curology to thank for but the pads definitely helped a lot!) I love them so much I really do think they work wonders!! I cut mine in half cause they come pretty saturated in liquid but mainly cause im broke!

Save your money and find an alternative.
